text: Sergey Semenovich Kozlov (4 May 1960 - 4 January 2014) was a Russian football player and manager. Kozlov played as a midfielder and defender. Kozlov died from problems after a heart attack on 4 January 2014. He was aged 53. He died in his hometown of Khabarovsk. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Khabarovsk Krai Category:Russian footballers
title: Sergey Kozlov
